title: U.S. Will Offer Embassy Services in a West Bank Settlement for the First Time
summary_full: Palestinians and Israelis on the right and left all say that the move is a step toward legitimizing the Israeli settlements, which most of the world considers illegal.
summary_public: Palestinians and Israelis on the right and left all say that the move is a step toward legitimizing the Israeli settlements, which most of the world considers illegal.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: legitimizing the Israeli settlements, which most of the world considers illegal
